name: vibe-da-ibm-cloud
description: A zero-cost, paste-or-upload web app that manifests live via IBM Cloud Object Storage.

inputs.name: vibe_html_input
inputs.description: Paste your HTML code here (leave blank for sample app).

inputs.name: region
inputs.description: IBM Cloud region for your COS instance.

outputs.name: vibe_url
outputs.description: Your live Vibe App URL (public endpoint)

outputs.name: primaryoutputlink
outputs.description: Primary output link promoted for IBM Cloud Projects
